  • Wesley K. G. Assunção

    Associate Professor

    Mantra/Mission: Investigates how to create and maintain software with the support of AI/ML, Model-Driven Engineering, and Systematic Reuse; providing customizable/flexible systems, with high quality standards, meeting technical, operational, and organizational needs.

    Core Research Areas: Software Modernization Variability Management and Systematic Reuse Software Quality Model-Driven Engineering Collaboration in Systems Engineering Software Testing AI/ML for software engineering
